title: Best Burrito AU - YouTube/Stream
body:
Hey guys. With the NBN on its way to my area, I've figured it's time to pick up my game and get into YouTube and streaming. I'm new to all this, so the quality of both video and myself won't be exceptional, although over time they will both improve. Hate it, like it, love it, whatever, I'm just putting it out there for anyone who is interested.

On that note, here's my newest video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZC2ZM8H1MaU.

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_P9vHmOaoUpIqy94gZBbKQ
Stream: http://www.twitch.tv/best_burrito_au

Thanks a bunch.

replies.body:
lucky u, gets the NBN.
And nahhh brahhh, be confident in ur vids.
Do ur best to make them so that ppl will love it :D
haters are there but most of them are there cuz theyr just bored but yeahhh, glllll

OHH OHHH, UR NOT ALLOWED TO USE COPYRIGHTED SONGS OR ULL GET FKED.
https://www.youtube.com/yt/copyright/
Thanks man. Haven't had any issues with copyright before when I've referenced but I'll review the rules tonight to make sure there's still no problems.
